mapper.select: insert into Issues ( name, type, priority, labels, status, description, assignee, reporter, created_time, updated_time, resolved_time, estimated, remaining, logged ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{labels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reporter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created_time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updated_time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{resolved_time,jdbcType=DATE}, #{estimated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remaining,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logged,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
